Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "InheritedAdminContext" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
In the context viewer, right click on the the "AdminContext" and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Framework title bar is "Orchestra Framework - AdminContext". The context entry of the "AdminContext" context is displayed in bold and ends with "(Current)"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Move the mouse cursor over Orchestra Framework system tray icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The tooltip shows "Orchestra Framework - AdminContext"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the context viewer, right click on the the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Framework title bar is "Orchestra Framework - InheritedAdminContext". The context entry of the "InheritedAdminContext" context is displayed in bold and ends with "(Current)". The context entry of the "AdminContext" context is no longer displayed in bold and no longer ends with "(Current)"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Move the mouse cursor over Orchestra Framework system tray icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The tooltip shows "Orchestra Framework -InheritedAdminContext"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext2" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext2" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext2"
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
In the context viewer, right click on the the "Participation to AdminContext" and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Framework title bar is "Orchestra Framework - Participation to AdminContext". The context entry of the "Participation to AdminContext" context is displayed in bold and ends with "(Current)"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Move the mouse cursor over Orchestra Framework system tray icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The tooltip shows "Orchestra Framework - Participation to AdminContext"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the context viewer, right click on the the "Participation to AdminContext2" and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Framework title bar is "Orchestra Framework - Participation to AdminContext2". The context entry of the "Participation to AdminContext2" context is displayed in bold and ends with "(Current)". The context entry of the "Participation to AdminContext" context is no longer displayed in bold and no longer ends with "(Current)"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Move the mouse cursor over Orchestra Framework system tray icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The tooltip shows "Orchestra Framework - Participation to AdminContext2"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create a d:\preunload_ok.vbs script : msgbox "Preunload OK" dim returnValue returnValue = 0 WScript.Quit returnValue
Create a d:\preunload_nok.vbs script : msgbox "Preunload NOK" dim returnValue returnValue = 1 WScript.Quit returnValue
Create a d:\preload_ok.vbs script : msgbox "Preload OK" dim returnValue returnValue = 0 WScript.Quit returnValue
Create a d:\preload_nok.vbs script : msgbox "Preload NOK" dim returnValue returnValue = 1 WScript.Quit returnValue
Create a d:\postload_ok.vbs script : msgbox "Postload OK" dim returnValue returnValue = 0 WScript.Quit returnValue
Create a d:\postload_nok.vbs script : msgbox "Postload NOK" dim returnValue returnValue = 1 WScript.Quit returnValue
Launch the Orchestra Framework
Create a new context
In the Orchestra category, add a path to the ArtefactPath variable
In the Orchestra category, add a path to the ConfigurationDirectories variables
In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PostLoad" to d:\postload_ok.vbs
In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PreLoad" to d:\preload_ok.vbs
In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PreUnload" to d:\preunload_ok.vbs
Save context
Set context as current context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Progress Information" dialog box is displayed A "PreLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Freecolumn1.Step_Freecolumn1_label: No PreUnload script is run because the previous context (Default) does anot have any

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PostLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context has as been set as current context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: All scripts return OK
Set context as current context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Progress Information" dialog box is displayed A "PreUnload OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PreLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PostLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context has as been set as current context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: PreUnload scritps returns NOK and has no effect on context switching
In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PreUnload" to d:\preunload_nok.vbs
Save context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Progress Information" dialog box is displayed A "PreUnload OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Freecolumn1.Step_Freecolumn1_label: The PreUnload variable from the previous context is used on context switch

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PreLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PostLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context has as been set as current context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Set context as current context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Progress Information" dialog box is displayed A "PreUnload NOK" popup window is displayed

Step_Freecolumn1.Step_Freecolumn1_label: The PreUnload variable from the previous context is used on context switch

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PreLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PostLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context has as been set as current context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Preload script returns NOK interrupts context switching
In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PreLoad" to d:\preload_nok.vbs
Save context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Progress Information" dialog box is displayed A "PreUnload NOK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PreLoad NOK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error dialog box is displayed: 'Unable to apply context'

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Details >>"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error message is displayed: "Script 'd:\preload_nok.vbs' has exited with error code '1'"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Continue"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PreUnload NOK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Default context has been set as current context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PreLoad" to d:\preload_ok.vbs
Save context
PostLoad script returns NOK interrupts context switching
In the Orchestra -> Scripts category, set "PostLoad" to d:\postload_nok.vbs
Set context as current context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Progress Information" dialog box is displayed A "PreLoad OK" popup window is displayed

Step_Freecolumn1.Step_Freecolumn1_label: No PreUnload popup window is displayed since the Default context does not provide one

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "PostLoad NOK" popup window is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error dialog box is displayed: 'Unable to apply context'

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on "Details >>"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An error message is displayed: "Script 'd:\postload_nok.vbs' has exited with error code '1'"

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Set administrator current context from command line

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Log ad user "\Administrator"
Create directory d:\Tests\Artefacts
Create directory d:\Tests\Administrator
Launch the Orchestra Framework
Create a new administrator context called "AdminSilver" in d:\Tests\Administrator
Within the "AdminSilver" context, click on the "Orchestra" category
Edit "Segment" variable and set its value to "Silver"
Edit the \Orchestra\ArtefactPath variable and new "FileSystem\Directories in File System" environment with value "d:\Tests\Artefacts"
Edit the "\Orchestra\ConfigurationDirectories" variable and add a new "FileSystem\Directories in File System" environment whose values are paths to ConfdirOffice and ConfdirOrchestraFramework
Save context
Exit the Orchestra Framework
Log out
Login as a standard user
Launch the Orchestra Framework
Try to import contexts from d:\Tests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: No context is available for import from d:\Tests\Administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Exit the Orchestra Framework
Launch the Orchestra Framework from the command line: framework.exe -setCurrentContext d:\Tests\Administrator\AdminSilver

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Framework has been launched. The "AdminSilver" has been successfully imported in the workspace and has been set as current context.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Exit the Orchestra Framework
Launch the Orchestra Framework (from the start menu)

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminSilver" is still available in the workspace and still set as current context
